snippet.title: Songs of Silence - 1.0 Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Songs of Silence is an Art Nouveau-inspired turn-based strategy game. It features a unique mix of kingdom and army management, hero development and real-time combat.

coming on November 13th, 2024 to PC, PlayStation and Xbox

🟠 Steam – https://store.steampowered.com/app/2195410/Songs_Of_Silence/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=release1.0&&utm_term=20241111&utm_content=sos-launch-trailer-native
🔵 PlayStation – https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011866/
🟢 Xbox – https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/songs-of-silence/9nlz55vqrpgn

🎮 Epic 4X fantasy strategy game 
⚔️Fast-paced, tactical gameplay
🎨 Art Nouveau-inspired visuals 
👥 Multiplayer support for up to 5 players
🌍 A rich world filled with stories and secrets 
🎼 An epic soundtrack by Hitoshi Sakimoto (Final Fantasy Tactics) 

📜 Learn more at https://songs-of-silence.com/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=release1.0&&utm_term=20241111&utm_content=sos-launch-trailer-native
📰 Press Kit – https://impress.games/press-kit/rcp/songs-of-silence
